enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Co-requisite: Students must also register for PHYSICS 136-3. Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.
title: WCAS PHYSICS 130-3-01 College Physics

instructors.instructor_addr: Dearborn Observatory (2131 Tech Drive), Room 9A, Evanston

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is the third and final quarter of the college (algebra-based) physics sequence.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Have previously taken Physics 130-1 and 130-2 (or their equivalents). Students must be concurrently enrolled in Physics 136-3.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Students will understand the introductory theory of and be able to do calculations involving waves, sound, optics, interference, diffraction, special relativity, quantum mechanics, nuclear physics, and radiation.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Quizzes, exams, and cumulative final exam.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Textbook: 7th edition of Giancoli (2014): 0-321-62592-7 (required). A scientific calculator is required.

subject: PHYSICS
